tools

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Use this class to call methods when needed. This can be usefull to roll dice everywhere by just calling the method from here

      Base constructor

      • waitSec

        public void waitSec(int second,
                    boolean loading,
                    boolean dot)
        Call a loading event for "x" secondes & enable/disable "loading" & "dots"
        Parameters:
        second - int Seconds to wait
        loading - boolean Display loading or not
        dot - boolean Display dot every second or not

      • storyText

        public void storyText(java.lang.String lineOne,
                      java.lang.String lineTwo,
                      Character player,
                      ui.CharacterSheet characterSheet,
                      int controllerChoiceInt,
                      java.util.Scanner sc)
        Display text you want & let the player choosing to continue the game with a scanner
        Parameters:
        lineOne - String Text display in first line
        lineTwo - String Text display in second line
        player - Character To be able to display his character sheet
        characterSheet - CharacterSheet to display
        controllerChoiceInt - int Read input result when asking the player to make a choice
        sc - Scanner the scanner used
        See Also:
        CharacterSheet
